title: Emma's cowboy pie
ingredients: ['24 sausages', '2.5kg potatoes', '3 tins supermarket own baked beans', '1 to 2 tablespoons golden syrup, or to taste', '4 to 5 tablespoons BBQ sauce', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herbs', '1/2 tube tomato puree', '3 to 4 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 to 1 teapsoon lazy garlic, or to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', '30g butter', '2 to 4 tablespoons cream', '250g grated cheap cheese']
